title: expand to learn more
content: Dermaplaning is a skin treatment that uses an exfoliating blade to skim dead skin cells and hair from your face. Itâ€™s also called microplaning or blading.

title: Dermaplaning Classic Facial
content: cleansing, dermaplane, LED light treatment, hydrating/soothing mask and finishes with serums/sunscreen

title: Dermaplaning GloGetter
content: all the benefits of Hydrafacial level 1 along with dermaplane.

title: Dermaplaning GloPro
content: all the benefits of Hydrafacial level 3 along with dermaplane.
